channel.title: 🏢 Department of Computer Sciences University of Wisconsin-Madison on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Department of Computer Sciences University of Wisconsin-Madison on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: OTTER: Effortless Label Distribution Adaptation of Zero-shot Models
item.description: OTTER effortlessly adapts zero-shot models to new tasks by adjusting predictions using optimal transport, improving accuracy significantly without extra training data.
